name: Tortured Souls [PROLOGUE]
description:
A prologue of my upcoming game that hopefully won't get canceled.

This is a fangame of The Return to Freddy's saga, all of the models used in this game are owned by BFPFILMS.

FNaF Saferoom credits to: freddypizza13, YinyangGio1987, Thudner, JuanitoAlcachofaz & End4ErKiIler213
